name: Do not fall (itch) (osamamsa123)
description:
It tells its story it is a simple game and it is a kind of short game. It is a challenging parkour based game. You have 3 attempts. You must skip the stages without falling into any hole. There is a chicpoint that works if you turn on the flashlight and if you dare and fall then a crazy and eccentric person will chase you in order to kill you then you will lose and you will start from the beginning and if you pass all the stages you will get a weapon and this weapon you will take in order to kill the person who is chasing you

 Note: The game is very difficult, so you must calm your nerves when playing it
